title: Mayor Hancock Recognizes Energy Efficiency Leaders, Announces New Challenge (City and County of Denver, CO) ...
text: ( Source : City and County of Denver , CO) Today , Mayor Michael B. Hancock recognized 44 businesses and 109 Denver buildings that are leading the way in energy efficiency. He also announced a new program aimed at increasing awareness and
